channel.title: [525] Turmoil Pkzs Curses || Torva || Chaotics || Primal || OverLoads
channel.description:
Client Download Mirrors: [url=https://www.box.com/s/eb2cd00699cace9eaac9]Download Now![/url] Our Website: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/]Go there[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/phpBB3/index.php]Sign up[/url] Vote: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/vote.html]Vote Now![/url] Donate: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/donate.html]Go there[/url] [FONT=Lucida Console][u]Why Choose Turmoil Pkzs[/u] Turmoil Pkzs/Invision-X is a fully functional Economy server with 30+ players and a dedicated hardworking staff We are brand new and need some dedicated players who love to pk to join our community We have an awesome staff a great pking server, hand coded website and a forums thats ready to go! Our server is running on over 8 GB of dedicated RAM to deliver blazing fast speeds with zero lag!! We have all the items you know and love such as torva, staff of light, korasi, barrows with working set effect, chaotics, pernix, virtus, spirit shields claws and sooo much more ;)
[b]Attention THIS IS A BETA TESTING SERVER NOT THE OFFICIAL RELEASE we are however looking for a dedicated staff to help make this server great[/b]
[u]Staff List[/u] Owner/Developer:Aerodude Co-Owner/Assistant Coder: Petarpwns11 Admin:Open Admin:Open Mod:Open Mod:Open
[u]Turmoil's Features[/u] -added brand new donor system, and voting system -vote for cash option -dedicated programmers to deliver the best gaming experience possible -new home in edgeville -insidiax client -added x10 hits -spirit shield damage soaking added -summoning base completed -pack yaks actually hold items -All godswords with specials -Dungeoneering base -Curses with Soul Split and Turmoil -perfected vengeance -awesome deflect melee, range, and mage (deflects damage back at attacker) -leech skills and specials working for ancient curses - Fun Pking -Real wildy -24/7 uptime -Double Exp weekends with double Dungeoneering and Pking points -Real ancient magicks with ice barrage+effect + orb animation -Lunar magics with venge -Awesome staff -Ancient warriors equipment -Fully functioning Donor system, website, and forums -WEBCLIENT ON THE WAY -[b]Now Compatible With Macs!![/b] -All spirit shields including divine with effect creating spirit shield with sigils works as well -All chaotics!!!!!!!!!! (Rapier longsword kiteshield maul staff crossbow and some more that im forgetting :) -Torva Virtus and Pernix armours -Overloads, Staff of light, korasi's sword with special! -staff of light cuts damage in half for 1 minuete! -641 items (choatics overloads, torva etc) -D claws of course ;P -And perfefct modern Pking just like in RS! [u]Minigames[/u] - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Cave - Fight Pits - Duel Arena[/FONT]
Come join us we would love to have you be a part of our community were online NOW!! Our Website: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/]Go there[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/phpBB3/index.php]Sign up[/url] Vote: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/vote.html]Vote Now![/url] Donate: [url=http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/donate.html]Go there[/url]
